department: public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Acquire 1 MAIN DOOR SEAL for Dash 7 Aircraft
description: Details can be found in the procurement document.
duration_in_months: There is no duration specified for the contract.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Aircraft Part for the DASH 7

#### Contract Information

*   **Reference Number:** PW-_CAG-017-29174
*   **Solicitation Number:** T8493-230040/A
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-27T14:00:00
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procedure:** Competitive Procurement Strategy, Best Overall Proposal

#### Description of Request for Proposal

The Government of Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the acquisition of one item, MAIN DOOR SEAL, for the DASH 7 Aircraft, Serial No. 102, Tail No. 922 under the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series. The selected supplier will provide the required part to Transport Canada.

#### Tender Requirements

This tender is only open to qualified suppliers who are registered with the Government of Canada and classified under the National Master List (NML) or able to meet the qualification requirements.

#### Suppliers Invited to Participate

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

*   Aero Precision Industries LLC
*   Aero Supplies Inc
*   Non-Destructive Testing Products Ltd
*   Maxcraft Avionics Ltd.
*   ...

#### Proposal Submissions

The RFP documents will be sent directly to the invited suppliers. Bidders are advised that the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.

#### Contact Information for Suppliers

Inquiries regarding this RFP should be addressed to Valerie Bourassa, Supply Officer, at (873) 455-0980 or [valerie.bourassa@tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:valerie.bourassa@tpsgc.gc.ca). Interested suppliers must submit their proposals electronically via email to the same address.

#### Timeline and Terms

The tender closing date is 2023-09-27T14:00:00. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

#### Media of Supply

Suppliers must submit their proposals electronically to the Government of Canada.

### Note

The Government of Canada will post a notice once a year on the GETS to invite additional suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series. Suppliers who wish to become qualified should contact Oliver Morones, Supply Specialist, at (873) 455-5233 or [oliver
